tta.player.death_message.4: was devoured by a Garlic Mutant
tta.player.death_message.5: 's face was bitten off by a Garlic Mutant
tta.advancement.root.name: §fTall Tales
tta.advancement.root.description: §fTall Tales is a datapack focused on bringing creatures of horror and myth to your world, with a Minecraft twist! Fight or take flight from the horrors of the night as you try to stay alive in this new hostile environment.
tta.advancement.frogzilla_coming.name: §fStomp, Stomp
tta.advancement.frogzilla_spawn.name: §fThe Frog that Ate Everything
tta.advancement.frogzilla_spawn.descript: §aAnd this time, fireflies won't cut it
tta.advancement.frogzilla_killed.name: §fExplosive Appetite
tta.advancement.sanguinezilla_coming.des: §aNow is the worst time for you to show up!
tta.advancement.sanguinezilla_spawn.name: §fTerror Under the Red Sky
tta.advancement.sanguinezilla_killed.des: §5Vanquish Frogzilla on a blood moon, at his angriest and hungriest
tta.advancement.garlic_summon.name: §fInstant Gene Editing
tta.advancement.garlic_summon.descriptio: §5Splash some Mutant Serum on your garlic crops and watch them grow
tta.advancement.garlic_spawn.name: §fCarnivorous Plants
tta.advancement.garlic_killed.name: §fWeedkiller
tta.advancement.alchemy_table.name: §fScience Away!
tta.advancement.infusion_table.name: §fQuestionable Legality
tta.advancement.science_10.name: §fScience Major
tta.advancement.science_30.name: §fPhD Haver
tta.advancement.garlic.name: §fFart Smella
tta.advancement.aconite.name: §fWerewolves Hate Him!
tta.advancement.nightshade.name: §fPortable Death Wish
tta.advancement.nightshade_found.name: §fPretty Purple Petals
tta.advancement.nightshade_found.descrip: §aFind and harvest the mystical Blooming Nightshade
tta.advancement.silver.name: §fGold's Cooler Cousin
tta.advancement.silver.description: §aSteal some silver from the Illagers' hoard
tta.advancement.silver_craft.name: §fPhilosopher's Stone
tta.advancement.silver_craft.description: §aSynthesize a Silver Ingot with the power of science!
tta.advancement.livingwood_craft.name: §fQuestionably Vegan
tta.advancement.livingwood_armor.name: §fJust Like Bear Grylls!
tta.advancement.livingwood_armor.descrip: §aCraft Adaptive Armor with Livingwood and Cursed Straw
tta.advancement.holy_hand_grenade.name: §fJust Throw it Already!
tta.advancement.holy_hand_grenade.descri: §aSaint Attila raised the hand grenade up on high, saying, 'O Lord, bless this thy hand grenade, that with it thou mayst blow thine enemies to tiny bits, in thy mercy.' And the Lord did grin. And the people did feast upon- wait, sorry, just craft a Holy Hand Grenade
